alert.note: Alert for Sheridan Foothills (Wyoming) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 26 at 3:17PM MDT by NWS Billings
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southeastern Sheridan County through 400 PM MDT... At 316 PM MDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 21 miles northeast of Lake De Smet, or 26 miles northeast of Buffalo, moving east at 30 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and penny size hail, along with very heavy rainfall. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Clearmont, Leiter and Arvada. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
